text: Resident Evil 6 is a survival horror video game made by Capcom for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 game consoles. It's the next game in the Resident Evil video game series for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The demo for Resident Evil 6 received bad reviews from IGN. The actual game itself received mixed reviews from reviewers such as GameSpot, IGN and G4. == References == Category:2012 video games Category:2010s horror video games Category:Resident Evil Category:Capcom games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Apocalyptic video games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Third-person shooters Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about police officers Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games set in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox One games
title: Resident Evil 6
